name: The Other Detectives (Demo Version)
description:
The demo version of the kinetic novel, The Other Detectives, developed by Studio Arno.

Made with Ren'Py, and available to play on PC - Windows, Linux and Apple Macintosh compatible.

The Other Detectives is a kinetic visual novel that follows the investigations of Aiyana Goodwin, a vampire detective, and her team. When a man is murdered in the nearby national park, Aiyana must investigate with her colleagues Leon, Elliot, Lakyah and a surprise new addition – a man named Chepe. Together, they will discover who murdered Jamie Donnett, and why.

This is the demo version. The full version is still in production and will be crowdfunded on Kickstarter soon.

Studio Arno can be found on Twitter.
